Parameters: Whether this action has a next state.
hasNext(boolean).Description: Indicates whether this action has a next state and should display a chevron.

Parameters: The check set ID, or {@link #NO_CHECK_SET) to indicate no check set.
checkSetId(int).Description: Indicates whether this action is part of a single-select group similar to radio buttons. When one item in a check set is checked, all others with the same check set ID will be unchecked automatically.

Parameters: The resource ID for the icon associated with this action.
The context whose resource ID should be retrieved.
iconResourceId(int, android.content.Cont.Description: Sets the action's icon drawable by retrieving it by resource ID from the specified context. This is a convenience function that simply looks up the drawable and calls @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidedAction#Builder#icon_E@.
iconResourceId(int, android.content.Cont.FullName: public GuidedAction.Builder iconResourceId (int iconResourceId, Context context)

checked(boolean).Description: Indicates whether this action is initially checked.

Parameters: Whether this action has a multiline description.
multilineDescription(boolean).Description: Indicates whether the title and description are long, and should be displayed appropriately.

enabled(boolean).Description: Indicates whether this action is enabled. If not enabled, an action cannot be clicked.

description(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the description for this action. The description is typically a longer string providing extra information on what the action will do.

title(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the title for this action. The title is typically a short string indicating the action to be taken on click, e.g. "Continue" or "Cancel".

Parameters: The intent associated with this action.
intent(android.content.Intent).Description: Sets the intent associated with this action. Clients would typically fire this intent directly when the action is clicked.

Parameters: Whether this action has a next state.
infoOnly(boolean).Description: Indicates whether this action is for information purposes only and cannot be clicked.

Parameters: The drawable for the icon associated with this action.
The ID to associate with this action.
id(long).Description: Sets the ID associated with this action. The ID can be any value the client wishes; it is typically used to determine what to do when an action is clicked.

Returns: The GuidedAction as configured through this Builder.
build().Description: Builds the GuidedAction corresponding to this Builder.
